function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contaminated medical waste mixing with domestic waste","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within the community","Mitigation":"Segregation and separate disposal of medical waste","Technologies":"Waste segregation and disposal technologies","People":"Community members, waste management operators","Owner":"Government, waste management operators"},{"Description":"Neglect of waste management as an urgent public service","Impact":"Secondary health and environmental effects due to improper waste management","Mitigation":"Treating waste management as an essential public service","Technologies":"Waste management and disposal technologies","People":"Community members, waste management operators, government","Owner":"Government, waste management operators"},{"Description":"Neglect of environmental impact of the epidemic","Impact":"Long-term environmental problems and challenges in managing the impact","Mitigation":"Acknowledging and addressing the environmental impact of the epidemic","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and management technologies","People":"Environmental agencies, government, public health agencies","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"}]}
